I'm amazed at his rapid progress in English.
His score on the English test is quite satisfactory.
tr: İngilizce sınavındaki notu oldukça tatmin edici.

en: What I don't like about his films is that they're not grounded in reality.
His influence is still potent.
His influence is still undiminished.
His luck has changed, he is going to the dogs, but no one even lifts a finger to help him.
tr: Şansı tersine döndü, batıyor ama kimse yardım etmek için kılını bile kıpırdatmıyor.

en: His doom is sealed.
He is a very careful driver.
His driving was against traffic rules.
Have you ever heard of him?
I know of him, but I don't know him personally.
His lie complicated matters.
His right leg was asleep.
His drinking habit is an old one.
His chief attraction lies in his character, not his books.
tr: Asıl çekici yanı kitapları değil, kişiliği.

en: His shot didn't carry well against the wind.
His life was full of ups and downs.
All his hopes evaporated when he lost his only son in the war.
tr: Savaşta tek oğlunu kaybedince bütün umutları suya düştü.

en: His only son succeeded to all his wealth.
tr: Tek oğlu tüm servetini miras aldı.

en: His family moved into a new house in the suburbs.
tr: Ailesi şehir dışında yeni bir eve taşındı.

en: His doctor advised him to give up smoking.
His doctor told him not to drink alcohol.
He leaves a widow and a daughter.
tr: Geride bir eş ve bir kız çocuğu bıraktı.

en: His ashes are buried here.
His clothes are worn out.
His nasty comments fueled the argument.
tr: Kötü yorumları tartışmayı daha da alevlendirdi.

en: His will was transmitted to his younger brother.
He won the day by virtue of his strength of will.
We should confirm his intentions once more.
tr: Niyetini bir kez daha teyit etmeliyiz.

en: Don't go against his wishes.
I want you to meet him in order to hear his opinion.
tr: Fikrini almak için onunla görüşmeni istiyorum.

en: It would not be amiss to ask his views.
tr: Onun görüşlerini sormakta bir sakınca olmaz.

en: His remark was really out of line.
His opinion inclines towards the conservative.
His opinions are variable.
He differs in opinion from her.
His ideas sound crazy.
His opinion is reasonable.
His opinion does not arouse any echo in his colleagues.
I thought his remarks very apropos.
I thought his opinion was relevant.
I think his opinion is of great importance.
I think his opinion is very important.
His opinion will probably be accepted.
His opinion is generally correct.
His opinion is quite just.
His opinion doesn't count.
His opinion was not accepted.
His opinion is in conflict with mine.
His opinion comes into conflict with mine.
His views are in accord with mine.
His opinion is different from mine.
He is humble about his opinion.
His remarks added up to a condemnation of my plan.
tr: Sözleri planımı kınamaktan başka bir şey değildi.

en: His opinion was completely beside the point.
His opinion is quite different from ours.
His opinions are in accord with ours.
His view is quite logical.
His opinion adds a new light to the question.
tr: Fikri, konuya yeni bir ışık tutuyor.
